item.title: 2020 10 05 Github Pages
item.description: The story part I had been thinking about registering a domain for a custom email address. I was looking for an easy to remember name that would look professionnal without necessarily going for a common TLD such as .com. .ca, etc. Having a Google account and knowing thy offer a registrar service, I had a look. That’s how I came across the .dev TLD. Marketing dept’s doing its job well so I clicked that attractive button.

item.title: About me
item.description: CV Downloadf English version will be available soon. Elevator pitch My name is Mathieu and I’m a insert title. I enjoy searching for the whys and hows, trying to break them and making them better. I completed a Bachelors of cybersecurity at Polytechnique Montr√©al and would like you to benefit from it. I love reading and I love learning. New concepts, new skills, my interests cover a wide area from technology to health and wellness.
